anagram.challenge: How many people are waiting for the Bard to perform
How many coins would I have if I have 0 coins and attempt to buy 10 loaves of bread for 3 coins each?

anagram.challenge: How many fishermen are there on the fishing platform
One pipe fills a barrel in 1 hour while another pipe can fill the same barrel in 2 hours. HOw many minutes will it take to fill the tank if both pipes are used?

riddle.text: Always walking around the castle grounds and somehow knows everyone's age.
In a town where Wizards are known to gather, search a large house to the north
riddle.solution: Yanille, locked chest on the second floor. Requires killing a man on the first floor to get a key.
